metadata.title: Web Audit Tenerife | Visibility & WPO Report
metadata.description: Does your website not sell? ðŸ“‰ Get a professional Technical SEO & WPO Audit. We analyze Core Web Vitals, traffic, and conversions. Real diagnosis.

hero.h1_lead: Do you feel your website is invisible? Don't rely on intuition. We analyze your site with official data tools to tell you exactly what is failing and how your competition is outperforming you.

symptoms.title: Symptoms of a Sick Website
symptoms.content: Often the problem isn't the product, it's the vehicle. If you ask yourself these questions, you need this report:

featureCards.title: Why isn't my website selling?
featureCards.description: You have traffic but no one contacts you. We analyze user behavior (GA4) and leak points.

featureCards.title: My website loads very slow
featureCards.description: Google penalizes slowness. We measure the real impact on your Core Web Vitals.

featureCards.title: I don't appear on Google
featureCards.description: Your competition shows up first. We audit your technical structure and the real queries finding you.

methodology.title: Audit Based on Real Data
methodology.content: We don't use 'gut feelings', we use the official Google ecosystem for an objective and professional analysis.

nextStep.title: Diagnosis is the First Step
nextStep.content: This report doesn't just tell you what's wrong, it tells you how to fix it. It is the ideal preliminary step for our Web Maintenance service, where we apply the solutions.

ctaFinal.title: Want to know the truth about your website?
ctaFinal.content: Get a technical, impartial, and clear analysis. Discover the hidden potential of your business.
